liberal.description: The Liberal Party is the oldest federal political party in Canada. The party generaly sits to the left of the Conservative Party and to the right of the New Democratic Party.

policies.Health: Hi My Name is bob asdasdasd . The Liberal party promises to restore the Old Age Security age of eligibility back to 65 years from the current 67 and increase the Guaranteed Income Supplement for single low-income seniors by ten percent. The party promises to introduce.
